data.text: Welcome Home @fccincinnati!  We can't wait for your first home game on your brand new pitch. We're proud to be The Official Airline of FC Cincinnati! ⚽ https://t.co/9YziG4xe9y

@caliman2002 Hi there! This still remains to be determined at this time. We can tell you that we will not be offering service between SCK and SAN for the rest of this year. If you have additional questions or concerns, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

data.text: @Puma420 Hey there! If you are signed up for our email alerts, you’ll receive promotional fares and codes whenever they become available. If you are interested in signing up for our promotional emails, please visit https://t.co/KYVdXwONUs. -JH

urls.title: Customer Request For Assistance | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Do you have specific travel issues? We’re here to help! Use the online form to send us a customer assistance request.

data.text: @jh_joy5 Hi there! We have no affiliation with Swift air Reno. We’re so sorry to hear about this! If you were unable to report checked baggage issues at the airport, please email us about your missing baggage here: https://t.co/pRy6k7IsSK - C
You are the reason we're committed to #GoingTheDistance. #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/KnT0mVJTtv

@Ashtonlbh08 Hi Ashton! Thanks for reaching out with this question. There is a hold time when seeking to speak with a rep over the phone and at this time, we are experiencing a higher number of calls than usual. If you are seeking assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@Iowagal46 Hi Patti! If you are seeking assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the specific details of your request. - C

@amanduhcarlisle Hi Amanda! We're sorry to hear about this. Please be aware that our ticket counters open 2 hours prior to departure and close promptly 45mins prior to departure. If you are seeking assistance, you may send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@thomasr65404411 Hi Thomas! If you plan on not taking the delayed flight, please send us a DM with your details and we will cancel the itinerary and provide you with a refund. - GM
@tylerLtomlinson What great news, Happy Mother's day to your mom! Sounds like you are an amazing son!!! -JH 🙌 ❤️

urls.title: Pet Travel | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Allegiant permits traveling with pet dogs & cats on flights within the contiguous 48 states and Puerto Rico. Pet travel requirements, fees and pet carrier information.

data.text: @KandiSamples You are able to travel with a personal item and carry-on bag, in addition to a pet-in-cabin  For more information, please visit: https://t.co/OjNJjqJadt. You can also send us a DM with any other questions. -JH

@ravensong04 Our apologies for any inconvenience. Overhead bin spaces are not guaranteed for your luggage to be placed in your specific row. However, can be placed in an available overhead compartment. -JH

@jackieperez1993 We do have a have the option to speak with Spanish speaking passenger when calling in. Customer Care can be reached by calling 702-505-8888, press 2 when prompted. If in need of further assistance, feel free to send a DM. -JH

@SethMil65844670 Hey Seth. To receive a refund, you must cancel your reservation within 24 hours of booking and the departure must be at least 7 days out. Should you have further questions, send us a DM. -JH
@jackieperez1993 We are sorry to hear about this. If you are seeking assistance, please have the passenger reach out to us. - JH
@MaxChesnes Oh Max! You really made my day, thank you so much!!! -JH 😍
@jackieperez1993 Hi Jackie! We're sorry to hear you have been unable to contact us. Please have the passenger reach out to us via DM and we would be happy to assist. -JH

data.text: @brainbrianblog We do not require proof of a negative COVID-19 test to travel, unless you have been granted an exception for a qualifying disability. If your exemption is approved, a negative COVID test will be required. Check out our current safety measures here: https://t.co/qT768kJfYx - C

We know you're not supposed to stare directly at the sun, but in this case, who can blame us? #ItsJustSoPretty

📸: porttfour https://t.co/vnOBMshlG2
@whodisisyo Hi John! Our records indicate that we were able to get this worked out for you. If you should need further assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@anna_beckett2 Hi Anna! If you are seeking assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC letting us know how we may be able to help you. - C

@johnacardjr If you have a round trip ticket, the cost of a checked bag would double. The $60 fee would be correct for a round trip. Please send us a DM if you have any further questions. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@FinFollower Hi! We're sorry you are having a hard time reaching us. The early morning is usually a little busier. If you need assistance, please send us a DM at any time. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@bean2030 Great question! Not all chemicals are dangerous. This product is safe and effective, forming a colorless, odorless protective barrier on all surfaces. If you have further questions or concerns, feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@Stevegraub There is a hold time when seeking to speak with a rep over the phone. We sincerely appreciate your patience and understanding as our reps work to assist each caller in the order in which their call is received. - C

@Stevegraub Hi Steve! Thanks for reaching out with this question. For this, it is best to call in to our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888. We have agents staffed and standing by 24/7 to take your call. You cannot do this over chat, unfortunately. - C

data.text: @NEIFundPeter Hi Peter! We are delighted to hear that you enjoy our service. As an ultra low-cost carrier, we have yet to put plans into place to offer optional WiFi service on our flights. - C

@tstrahle Hi Tom! Our mobile app is working at this time. If you are experiencing issues, please try deleting the app and making sure that your mobile device is fully updated before re-downloading it. - C

@tweeterle Hi there! Please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC w/ the name of the rep you are referring to and your reservation information so that we may look into this situation. - C

data.text: @PotroRob Hi there! If you were unable to report checked baggage issues at the airport within 4 hours of arrival, please email us about your damaged baggage here: https://t.co/pRy6k7IsSK - C

@lizzie08105053 Hi Lizzie! You may be pleased to learn that we routinely treat all aircraft with an advanced antimicrobial protectant that kills viruses, germs and bacteria on contact for 14 days. You are welcome to send us a DM w/ the details of your experience, so that we may investigate. - C
@SeanClayton79 Hi Sean! Please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC so that we can troubleshoot with you. - C

data.text:
And the countdown officially begins... NFL Draft. Vegas. 2022. 🏈

We can't wait to welcome you to our hometown and @AllegiantStadm! 

🎥: @AllegiantStadm https://t.co/7yeb35DRAe

@ReneiceWalker We're sorry to learn of your recent travel experience. Passengers are required to wear a face mask over their mouth & nose when traveling (except to briefly remove for the consumption of food/beverages). Please notify a member of our team to rectify your concerns immediately. -JH

@DjCL662 Hi! To prevent crowding on the jet bridge and in the aircraft aisle, we now board our passengers in rows starting with the back of the plane and continuing to the front. It is recommended to inform a member of our flight crew, in the event your seat has been utilized. -JH
@Tropical__Ice Our apologies for any frustration. If in need of assistance, feel free to send us a DM. -JH
@000hshiny We are very sorry to hear, this is by no means Allegiant standards. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM so that we may review your flight details. -JH

@_LavishLocs Thanks for reaching out to us. We are sorry to hear that you had a negative experience with us. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC and a member of our team will be happy to help. - JH

@LaraBricker Hi Lara! Unfortunately at this time, we do not have plans to offer service to/from PSM and MYR. However, we will be sure to share your feedback with our planning team for consideration. -JH
@queedoe Hi there! We're so sorry to hear you are having a hard time reaching us. Please send us a DM for assistance. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@curd What a great picture! -JH
@cody_king6 We're sorry to feel this way. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to send us a DM. - GM

You know what they say! "When there's a wish, there's a way." Happy #WorldWishDay, @makeawishsnv! We look forward to being a part of many more wishes to come. 

📸: tony57_aviation https://t.co/Aipi8q6jQO
@jgilmore Hi Jonathan! We're so sorry to learn about this. Can you tell us your flight number, please? - GM
@ChristieAnn5 Hi Christie. We're sorry to learn about your delay! If you need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@1moppet We will let our teams know and someone will be down shortly. Thanks for letting us know. - GM
@1moppet Hi there! We're so sorry for the delay. Please tell us your flight number. - GM
@_LaBlondeJames To review your flight details, please send us a PM with your confirmation number and email address on file. -JH
@_LaBlondeJames Hi Miranda! At this time we do not have any plans of canceling the flight. - GM
@mikeMaher We're sorry to hear of your delayed flight, Mike. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH
